roleset.name: to utter a harsh, loud sound, as that of a donkey
roleset.note: BRAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bray' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38 37.3. (from bray.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Donkey
example.text: The donkey brayed at the chickens in his pen.

example.name: ARG
example.text: Parting immediately, according to agreement, it fell out that they both brayed at the same instant, and each of them, deceived by the braying, ran to seek the other, thinking he had found the ass.
